original_title: 親友だと思ってたのアンタだけだよ?w この女ムカつくから好き放題レイプしちゃっていいよーw
overview: We used to get along like sisters. When did the gears of the two of us start going crazy? Mai does everything flawlessly. But I'm clumsy... nothing worked. I felt like I was looked down on by Mai. And when she was sure it wasn't on her mind, she felt something snap inside me.
title: You Thought you was my Only Best Friend? W You Can Do Whatever You Want Because This Woman Is Crazy
